Shipping Policy

RK Oxygen Gorakhpur - Reliable delivery of industrial gases and equipment

Overview

At RK Oxygen Gorakhpur, we understand that timely and safe delivery of industrial gases and equipment is critical to your operations. Our shipping policy ensures reliable service while maintaining the highest safety standards for hazardous materials.

Safety First: All shipments comply with hazardous materials transportation regulations and industry safety standards. We prioritize the safe handling and delivery of gases and compressed equipment.

Order Processing

Order Confirmation

Orders are confirmed within 2-4 hours during business hours. Emergency orders receive priority processing.

Preparation & Safety Check

Products are prepared with safety inspections and proper packaging for transportation.

Loading & Dispatch

Orders are loaded using specialized equipment and dispatched with delivery documentation.

Delivery Confirmation

You receive delivery confirmation with tracking information and expected arrival time.

Delivery Areas & Schedules

Primary Service Areas

Gorakhpur Region

Same-day delivery for urgent orders
Next-day delivery for standard orders

Lucknow & Nearby

1-2 day delivery
Express service available

Uttar Pradesh Districts

2-3 day delivery
Regional distribution network

Extended Areas

3-5 day delivery
Coordinated with logistics partners

Delivery Schedules

  • Morning Deliveries: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM (preferred for perishable or time-sensitive items)
  • Afternoon Deliveries: 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM (standard delivery window)
  • Emergency Deliveries: Available 24/7 for critical situations
  • Weekend Deliveries: Available for essential services (additional charges may apply)

Shipping Charges & Payment

Delivery Charges

  • Local Delivery (within 50km): Free for orders above ₹5,000
  • Regional Delivery: Calculated based on distance and order value
  • Express Delivery: Additional charges apply for urgent same-day service
  • Large Orders: Special arrangements available with volume discounts

Payment Terms

  • Payment due upon delivery for standard orders
  • Credit terms available for established business accounts
  • Advance payment required for first-time customers
  • All major payment methods accepted

Safety & Handling

Hazardous Materials: Industrial gases are classified as hazardous materials. All shipments comply with national and international transportation regulations including proper labeling, packaging, and documentation.

Safety Measures

  • DOT/IMDG certified cylinders and containers
  • Proper valve protection and pressure testing
  • Temperature-controlled transportation when required
  • Emergency response protocols and spill containment
  • Trained personnel for loading and unloading

Customer Responsibilities

  • Provide safe access for delivery vehicles
  • Ensure proper storage facilities are available
  • Follow safety guidelines for handling delivered products
  • Report any damage or issues immediately upon delivery

Delivery Terms & Conditions

Risk of Loss

Title and risk of loss pass to the customer upon delivery to the specified address. We recommend insurance coverage for high-value shipments.

Delivery Delays

  • We are not liable for delays caused by weather, traffic, or force majeure
  • Alternative delivery arrangements will be made when possible
  • Customers will be notified of any significant delays

Refusals & Returns

  • Inspect shipments upon delivery for damage or discrepancies
  • Report issues immediately to our delivery personnel
  • Return authorization required for any returns
  • Restocking fees may apply for unauthorized returns

Special Services

Installation & Setup

Professional installation services available for equipment and gas systems. Our technicians ensure proper setup and safety compliance.

Training Services

On-site training provided for safe handling and operation of delivered equipment and gases.

Maintenance Contracts

Scheduled maintenance and inspection services to ensure ongoing safety and performance.

Shipping & Delivery Inquiries

For shipping questions, delivery scheduling, or special requirements, please contact us:

  • Branch Manager: RK Oxygen Gorakhpur
  • Address: 85, RK Palace, Gangaprasad Road, Rakabganj, Lucknow – 226018, Uttar Pradesh
  • Phone: +91-7355755506
  • Email: gkp.rkoxygen@gmail.com
  • Emergency Line: +91-7355755506 (24/7)
  • Business Hours: Monday-Saturday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
